description:
SimpleX - the first messaging network operating without user identifiers of any kind - 100% private by design! iOS,
Android and desktop apps ðŸ“±!

Unlike any other existing messaging platform, SimpleX has no identifiers assigned to the users - it does not use phone
numbers (like Signal or WhatsApp), domain-based addresses (like email, XMPP or Matrix), usernames (like Telegram),
public keys or even random numbers (like all other messengers) to identify its users - we do not even know how many
people use SimpleX.
New in v6.4.5:
- fixes for chats with admins.
- better information about network errors.
The GitHub release build is independently reproduced by:

Commits:
- rfc: chat widgets and activities approach (#6169)
- flatpak: update metainfo (#6229)
- core: update simplexmq (error handling) (#6231)
- core: updated simplexmq to 6.4.5.0
- ui: navigation from support chat to member info (#6237)
- ui: fix report archiving (#6239)
- core, ui: correct member attention stat for support chat on opening it; mark support chat read (#6240)
- ui: delay closing support view on acceptance for items to be marked read (#6244)
- core: extended network errors information (simplexmq) (#6247)
- core: 6.4.5.0 (simplexmq 6.4.5.2)
- core: fix GHC 8.10.7 (#6248)
- core: 6.4.5.1
- ios: update core library
- ui: extended network error information (#6250)
- android, desktop: show alert when server test fails (#6251)
- ui: shorter alert titles (#6252)
- ios: export localizations
- website: translations (#6254)
- ui: translations (#6253)
- website: translations
- 6.4.5: ios 298, android 319, desktop 120
